EmailTemplate.name: 2.4.1a Payment Email for PL,APL,SW&CF (no advance)
EmailTemplate.subject: How you will be paid for your role on NCS with The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c}
Dear {!Job_placement__c.Contact_Name__c},
Congratulations on being appointed as {!Job_placement__c.Role__c} on NCS with The Challenge on {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}.
Your total pay for this part of the role will be {!Job_placement__c.Total_gross_pay__c}, this includes pay for {!Job_placement__c.Annual_Leave_entitlement__c} day(s), "Holiday Period"; per "Wave Contract", which is subject to tax and national insurance deductions. This payment will cover the following parts of the programme - NCS: Personal Challenge, NCS: Team Challenge and NCS: Real Challenge Design (one or more will be relevant to your role). Payments for NCS: The Real Challenge Action will be communicated to you at a later date once you have completed them.
You will be paid on {!Job_placement__c.Payroll_payment_date__c}. Tax and NI deductions will be made from this payment. We reserve the right to deduct pay for any unauthorised absences.
You will receive further information about your pay relating to the NCS Real Challenge Action weekends and Graduation (if applicable) in due course.
This payment structure has two principles:
(a) to ensure that staff members pay the appropriate level of tax in the correct month and (b) to enable staff members to receive payment in reasonable time.
Yours sincerely,
NCS with The Challenge {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c}
2.4.1a
